channel.title: English Help
channel.description:
i need help in writing a compare and contrast essay its due on friday which is in 3days.. can anyone help me out... here is my topic
After finishing high school you are thinking whether you should get a job or go to college/university. Write an essay in which you contrast two possibilities. Use any of the methods in making your analysis.
thanks :)

item.title: English Help
item.dc:creator: @darkilla darkilla
item.description:
@darkilla wrote:

well thx kane i got it lol
thx alot

Read full topic

item.title: English Help
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Uh, why are you asking for help on such a simple task?
Pick two possibilities, totally different, and compare the outcomes/lifestyles of them, as well as anything else the thesis and marking criteria states.

3 points - being the main points - probably introduction, possibility 1, possibility 2
sub points to possibility 1 & 2 - outcomes, lifestyle, events, qualifications. (whatever they ask for)
Conclusion - summary of comparing the two and probably which would deems preferable?

I need more information to inform you more, but that’s all the help I can really offer.

Ask your teacher for more information & read the marking critera if you need extra help.

Read full topic
